key.name: notification-threshold
key.description: Time in ms (1s = 1,000ms) before allowing duplicate notifications from the same source

key.name: app-themes
key.description: JSON object mapping application names to their notification colors

key.name: enable-rate-limiting
key.description: Whether to enable rate limiting for duplicate notifications

key.name: enable-custom-colors
key.description: Whether to apply custom colors to notifications based on application

key.name: notification-position
key.description: Position of notifications on screen: fill, left, right, or center
